Name: Spicy Strip Poker
About the game: ABOUT THE POKER GAME The game is a 5 card poker game, played with a deck of 32 cards. The player is dealt five cards, then begins a round of betting before replacing the cards. In this variant, the player is allowed to replace all five cards. After the replacement of cards follows another round of betting, and then the hands are revealed. The best hand wins the pot or splits the pot in case of a tie. During the betting round the player can bet/raise from 5 to 25, call, check, or fold. Hand rank [high-low] - Straight Flush - Four of a Kind - Flush - Full House - Straight - Three of a Kind - Two Pair - Pair - High Card ABOUT THE STRIP GAME The player can pick one of the available female opponents and try to beat her. The girls involved will be: - Amanda: a pink haired voluptuous goddess, ready to challenge you, but also to pay your spicy reward in case of defeat! - Yanet: a stunning and mysterious ebony beauty - Jessica: the blonde angel anyone dreams of - Victoria: could you even imagine a spicier girl than a spicy redhead? :) The player and the opponent start with a 200 stack each. Whenever the opponent reaches zero, she strips off a garment, until she is completely naked. At this point, the opponent remains completely naked and with a stack of 200. The player must still win her last money to unlock sex scenes. Obviously, if the player loses all the stack he loses the game, but no drama he can always start a new one. :)
